name: CircleCI Github Trigger
description: A Python/Django web app handle triggering CircleCI builds for certain branches in a Github repository with a custom parallelism

DEBUG.description: Determine whether to show Django's debug messages on errors.  Do not set to True on a production site!!!

GITHUB_USERNAME.description: The Github username used to create the webhooks on linked repositories

GITHUB_PASSWORD.description: The Github password.  Can also be a Github application token which bypasses 2fa.

CIRCLECI_TOKEN.description: The Github Developer App ID used by the Contributor Tool to do Github OAuth2 logins.  Not needed if you are not using the Contributor Tool

GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: The callback url configured for the Connected App, ex: https://your-app-name.herokuapp.com/mpinstaller/oauth/callback

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.
